@@ -1,4 +1,15 @@

+
+# autocompletion list
+if [ "${1}" = "shortlist" ]
+then

+  then
+    echo "help"
+  fi
+  exit
+fi
+
 if [ -n "${DEVON_IDE_TRACE}" ]; then set -vx; fi
 # shellcheck source=scripts/functions
 source "$(dirname "${0}")"/../functions

 #!/usr/bin/env bash
+
+# autocompletion list
+if [ "${1}" = "shortlist" ]
+then
+  if [ -z "${2}" ]

@@ -227,6 +241,7 @@ function doSetup() {
       echo -e "@echo off\r\npushd %~dp0\r\ncall devon.bat\r\npopd\r\ncmd\r\n" > "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/console.bat"

+

@@ -289,12 +304,17 @@ function doUninstallFromHome() {
   if [ -f "${1}/.bashrc" ]
   then
     doEcho "Uninstalling from ${1}/.bashrc"
-    grep -v '^alias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"$' "${1}/.bashrc" | grep -v '^devon$' > "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.bashrc" && mv "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.bashrc" "${1}/.bashrc"
+    grep -v '^alias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"$' "${1}/.bashrc" | grep -v '^devon$' | grep -v "^source ${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/scripts/devon-autocomplete$" > "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.bashrc" && mv "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.bashrc" "${1}/.bashrc"
   fi
   if [ -f "${1}/.zshrc" ]
   then
     doEcho "Uninstalling from ${1}/.zshrc"
-    grep -v '^alias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"$' "${1}/.zshrc" | grep -v '^devon$' > "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.zshrc" && mv "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.zshrc" "${1}/.zshrc"
+    grep -v '^alias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"$' "${1}/.zshrc" | grep -v '^devon$' | grep -v '^autoload -Uz compinit$' | grep -v '^compinit$' | grep -v '^autoload bashcompinit$' | grep -v '^bashcompinit$' | grep -v "^source ${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/scripts/devon-autocomplete$" > "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.zshrc" && mv "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.zshrc" "${1}/.zshrc"
+  fi
+  if [ -f "${1}/.bash_profile" ]
+  then
+    doEcho "Uninstalling from ${1}/.bash_profile"
+    grep -v '^alias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"$' "${1}/.bash_profile" | grep -v '^devon$' | grep -v "^source ${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/scripts/devon-autocomplete$" > "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.bash_profile" && mv "${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/updates/.bash_profile" "${1}/.bash_profile"
   fi
   if [ -f "${1}/scripts/devon" ]
   then

@@ -69,9 +80,13 @@ then
   echo "Setup or run npm."
   echo
   echo "Arguments:"
-  echo "                      run default build"
-  echo "setup                 setup angular-cli (install and verify)"
-  echo "«args»                call maven with the specified arguments"
+  echo "                          run default build"
+  echo " setup                    setup NPM (install and verify)"
+  echo " get-version              get the current project version"
+  echo " set-version «nv» [«cv»]  set the current project version to new version «nv» (assuming current version is «cv»)"
+  echo " check-top-level-project  check if you are running on a top-level project or fail if in a module or no NPM project at all"
+  echo " release                  start a clean deploy release build"
+  echo " «args»                   run NPM with the given arguments"
   echo
   echo "Options:"
   exit

@@ -72,24 +72,50 @@ then
   mkdir -p ~/.devon  
   echo "Copying devon CLI script to your home directory..."
   cp "${BASH_SOURCE:-$0}" ~/.devon/devon
+  AUTOCOMPLETION="source ${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/scripts/devon-autocomplete"
+  
   if [ ! -e ~/.bashrc ]
   then
     touch ~/.bashrc
   fi
   if ! grep -q "alias devon=" ~/.bashrc
   then
     echo "Installing devon alias to your .bashrc"
-    echo -e '\nalias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"\ndevon' >> ~/.bashrc
+    {
+      echo -e '\nalias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"\ndevon'
+      echo -e "${AUTOCOMPLETION}"
+    } >> ~/.bashrc
   fi
+
   if [ ! -e ~/.zshrc ]
   then
     touch ~/.zshrc
   fi
   if ! grep -q "alias devon=" ~/.zshrc
   then
     echo "Installing devon alias to your .zshrc"
-    echo -e '\nalias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"\ndevon' >> ~/.zshrc
+    {
+      echo -e '\nalias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"\ndevon'
+      echo -e "autoload -Uz compinit\ncompinit\nautoload bashcompinit\nbashcompinit\n${AUTOCOMPLETION}"
+    } >> ~/.zshrc
   fi
+
+  if [ "${OSTYPE:0:6}" = "darwin" ]
+  then
+    if [ ! -e ~/.bash_profile ]
+    then
+      touch ~/.bash_profile
+    fi
+    if ! grep -q "alias devon=" ~/.bash_profile
+    then
+      echo "Installing devon alias to your .bash_profile"
+      {
+        echo -e '\nalias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"\ndevon'
+        echo -e "${AUTOCOMPLETION}"
+      } >> ~/.bash_profile
+    fi
+  fi
+
   alias devon="source ~/.devon/devon"
   echo "The devon CLI script has been installed to your system."
   echo "Now in any new shell, you can call devon to setup your IDE environment variables."

@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
+#/usr/bin/env bash
+_devon_completions()
+{
+  local cur commandlist options
+  COMPREPLY=()
+  source ~/.devon/home
+  cur="${COMP_WORDS[COMP_CWORD]}"
+
+  options=""
+  if [[ ${cur:0:1} == "-" ]]
+  then
+    options="-b --batch -f --force -d --debug -q --quiet"
+    for (( i=0; i<$COMP_CWORD; i++ ))
+    do
+      options="${options/${COMP_WORDS[$i]}/}"
+    done
+  fi
+
+  if [ $COMP_CWORD -le 1 ]; then
+    commandlist=$(ls ${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/scripts/command/)
+    COMPREPLY=( $(compgen -W "${commandlist} help" -- ${cur}) )
+  elif [ $COMP_CWORD -eq 2 ]; then
+    commandlist=$(${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/scripts/command/${COMP_WORDS[1]} shortlist)
+    COMPREPLY=( $(compgen -W "${commandlist} ${options}" -- ${cur}) )
+  elif [ $COMP_CWORD -eq 3 ]; then
+    commandlist=$(${DEVON_IDE_HOME}/scripts/command/${COMP_WORDS[1]} shortlist ${COMP_WORDS[2]})
+    COMPREPLY=( $(compgen -W "${commandlist} ${options}" -- ${cur}) )
+  else
+    COMPREPLY=( $(compgen -W "${options}" -- ${cur}) )
+  fi
+  return 0
+}
+
+complete -F _devon_completions devon
\ No newline at end of file
